tweet_text: The COVID-19 pandemic has had a significant impact on Native American communities. However, the Indian Health Service, in collaboration with Tribal governments, organizations, and urban Indian groups, has been able to administer over 500,000 vaccines, with more to come.
CVS Pharmacy in Massachusetts is now providing COVID-19 vaccines to K-12 teachers, daycare and preschool workers, and staff. Please visit the link for more information.

COVID-19 has had a significant impact on our daily lives. However, with the availability of vaccines to millions and soon to everyone, we have the opportunity to take action and contribute to the fight against the virus. Let's roll up our sleeves and do our part. https://t.co/KGKjfKaX7T

I am thankful for the recent pledges made by the EU, Germany, Canada, Japan, and the US to support the global availability of safe and effective COVID-19 tests, treatments, and vaccines. The leadership of the G7 and ACT Accelerator is appreciated.

COVID-19 vaccines are crucial in stopping the pandemic. As of January 19th, over 13.5 million individuals have received their first dose of the vaccine, with over 2 million having received both doses and being fully vaccinated. For more information, visit https://t.co/zYLe3H12re. https://t.co/wgECA6chAO

Pfizer has reported that their COVID vaccine is highly effective, with a 97% efficacy rate against symptomatic COVID and a 94% efficacy rate against asymptomatic disease. This is a remarkable achievement in the field of science.

Vaccines for COVID-19 are thoroughly tested and proven safe and effective before being authorized for use in the EU. Europeans can trust in the rigorous testing and trials that these vaccines undergo. To learn more about the process, visit #SafeVaccines.

Programs like this can help address the challenges faced by underserved communities in Arizona, such as lack of internet access or transportation, which can make it difficult to receive the vaccine. By providing support and resources, these programs can help increase vaccination rates and ensure more people are protected against COVID-19.

According to a report, the mortality rate among young people who received Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine is hundreds of times higher than the mortality rate from the virus itself. The report also suggests that the mortality rate among the elderly who received the vaccine is dozens of times higher than the mortality rate from the virus. The report is based on data from Israel, where there has been a significant increase in death rates following the administration of the Pfizer vaccine.

As more evidence is gathered and new variants of the virus are discovered, it may be necessary to develop updated COVID-19 vaccines in the future to provide protection against these variants. For more information, please see the link provided.
President Biden is making it a priority to provide vaccines to teachers, school staff, and child care workers this month in order to help us return to normalcy.

COVID-19 vaccines are a crucial tool in the fight against the pandemic. Before getting vaccinated, it is important to understand the benefits and potential side effects. Harvard Health provides valuable information on what you need to know before getting vaccinated. Stay informed and stay safe. #HarvardHealth #COVID19

If Covid vaccines were developed quickly, then the current administration efficiently procured a surplus of vaccines. Their logistical mastery and discipline have saved the USA. We just need to continue being responsible and not act recklessly for a little while longer.

Cardinal Cupich of Chicago stated that all vaccines are morally acceptable and there is no need to choose between them. He expressed confusion about the reasons behind the few US bishops who have questioned the J & J vaccine and emphasized the importance of speaking with clarity on the matter.

There are many questions, concerns, and myths surrounding the new COVID-19 vaccines. It is important to address these in order to provide accurate information and alleviate any fears or misconceptions. Some common questions and concerns include the safety and efficacy of the vaccines, potential side effects, and the speed at which they were developed. There are also myths circulating about the vaccines, such as that they contain microchips or can alter DNA. It is important to rely on trusted sources of information, such as healthcare professionals and reputable news outlets, to learn more about the vaccines and make informed decisions about getting vaccinated.

The European Union has approved the fourth COVID-19 vaccine, which is Janssen (Johnson & Johnson). The EU has a strict authorisation process to ensure the safety and effectiveness of any vaccine on the market. For more information, visit the link provided. #StrongerTogether #VaccinesWork

There is currently no conclusive scientific evidence proving the safety or effectiveness of proposed COVID-19 vaccines. Claims made by the BBC and other mainstream media outlets suggesting otherwise are inaccurate. For reliable information, please refer to my blog for trusted sources.

Bishop Kevin C. Rhoades, who is the chairman of the Committee on Doctrine, has released a statement addressing moral and ethical concerns about COVID-19 vaccines. The full statement can be found at the provided link.

The export of COVID vaccine by the Modi Government is not an act of charity. The Gates Foundation provided $150 million to the Serum Institute for the fair distribution of the vaccine to India and low-middle income countries.

The California (B.1.427/B.1.429) and New York (B.1.526) variants of SARS-CoV-2 have been identified, joining the B.1.1.7, B.1.351, P.1, and B.1.2 lineages. This adds to ongoing research on how viral evolution may affect the effectiveness of COVID-19 vaccines. For more information, see the updated article at the provided link.

Hindustan Syringes, a family-run business led by Rajiv Nath, aims to meet the global demand for billions of syringes and needles during the pandemic. The company's products are "Made in India" and are being produced at a rate of 5,900 per minute. This effort is part of India's "AtmaNirbhar Bharat" initiative to become self-reliant.

I agree with the opinion that the Johnson & Johnson vaccine is not inferior despite the recent focus on certain efficacy rates without context. It is just as worthy of being administered and its authorization is a significant public health victory for the United States.
Hardin and Orange counties in Texas have expanded their vaccine eligibility beyond just phase 1A and 1B to include anyone who wants to receive the vaccine.
China has announced its commitment to provide coronavirus vaccines to 53 countries and export them to 27 more. State media has reported on the deliveries and celebrated the country's efforts.

On Wednesday, Governor Andy Beshear shared that Kentucky's positivity rate has decreased to 3.93%. This is attributed to more people receiving one of the three highly effective COVID-19 vaccines and following guidance from public health officials.
Countries must act quickly to meet the enormous challenge of delivering the COVID-19 vaccine. This article examines ways in which leaders can speed up their preparations.

Maryland healthcare providers have given out almost 1.9 million COVID-19 vaccines, with an average of 42,705 doses per day. People who are eligible for Phase 1 can now pre-register for mass vaccination sites by visiting a website or calling a phone number provided by the state.
On Wednesday, the President of the United States will meet with the CEOs of Johnson & Johnson and Merck at the White House to discuss their collaboration in producing additional COVID-19 vaccines.

Khairy welcomes private sector procurement of approved Covid-19 vaccines as Malaysia aims to achieve herd immunity by February 2022. The target is to administer 160,000 daily doses during the second and third phase of the vaccination programme.

As COVID-19 vaccines become more widely available, it's understandable that some people may still have concerns or questions. We recognize that there is a history of medical mistrust in some communities, and we want to help address any concerns you may have. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us with your questions.

We are asking the Canadian government and provinces to quickly approve AMX 0035, a new therapy from AmylyxPharma, for people with ALS. The speedy approval of COVID-19 vaccines shows that this is possible. We have reached out to news outlets such as Globe and Mail, CBC News, CTV News, and Global News to spread the word.

Next week, the state of Michigan will receive 11,400 doses of the Johnson and Johnson COVID-19 vaccine. Additionally, they will receive 98,200 first dose Pfizer vaccines and 133,380 first dose Moderna vaccines. The total number of vaccines Michigan will receive next week, including Johnson and Johnson, first and second doses, is 474,560 doses.

Country musician Larry Gatlin appeared on Fox and announced that he had contracted COVID-19 four days after receiving the second Moderna vaccine. He then expressed gratitude towards Moderna for the experience. The Fox host was then compelled to read a statement from the CDC clarifying that vaccines do not contain live virus.

It is unfortunate that Ghana seems to be lagging behind in terms of producing advanced goods and services, while other countries are making significant progress in areas such as technology and medicine. However, it is not productive to insult or belittle those who are working hard to create products in Ghana. It is important to acknowledge the challenges and work towards improving the system to support innovation and growth in the country.

I encourage those who are planning to receive the Covid-19 vaccine to consider filming themselves getting the shot and expressing gratitude towards those who have worked hard to make it possible. This includes President Trump and his administration, who have played a significant role in the vaccine's development and distribution. Let's come together to prioritize public health and safety during these challenging times.

COVID-19 vaccines are both safe and effective. The US FDA only authorizes vaccines for use after they have undergone thorough clinical trials to ensure their efficacy. Ongoing studies are conducted to continuously monitor their effectiveness. For more information, visit https://t.co/XHM1Q8nZ4X. https://t.co/oCyNsNnCzc

While there is still much work to be done to ensure equal access to vaccines, this progress is incredible.

If you're in Iowa and have a BMI index of 30-40+, regardless of age, you're now eligible for the COVID vaccine. While BMI scores aren't always the best indicator of health, the CDC considers it an underlying condition that puts you at higher risk for COVID. So, if this applies to you, please consider getting vaccinated.

The South Africa and Brazil variants have shown the potential to cause reinfection, but vaccines are still effective in preventing severe illness and hospitalization. Experts do not anticipate a significant immune escape.

We shouldn't limit ourselves to just one approach. Additionally, it's important to recognize that the issue of vaccine scarcity is a result of supply and demand, and not necessarily a political issue.

I had a pretty uneventful weekend. I just wanted to share some updates that I came across. Firstly, there was a National Day of Observance for Covid-19, which is a reminder of the impact the pandemic has had on our lives. Secondly, the PBS skating rink has closed for the season. Thirdly, it's important to continue practicing the 3Ws (wear a mask, wash your hands, and watch your distance) to prevent the spread of the virus. Lastly, the opening of the ARC as a vaccine clinic has been delayed until the end of March. If you're in Durham, don't forget to #RollUpYourSleeveDurham when it's your turn to get vaccinated!

New York Attorney General Lisa Landau has warned televangelist Jim Bakker to stop selling a fake cure for the coronavirus. Landau, who heads the AG's Health Care Bureau, sent a cease and desist letter to Bakker on Thursday, threatening legal action. The fake cure has been marketed on Bakker's show and includes a colloidal silver product that he claims can cure the virus. Landau has warned that such claims are false and potentially dangerous.

Italy has put 60 million people under lockdown due to the coronavirus outbreak. The number of cases has risen to over 9,000, up from 231 two weeks ago. All sporting events have been suspended, and schools and universities have been closed. Theatres, gyms, bars, funerals, and weddings have also been barred. This is an unprecedented situation.
